#summary Positioning options

= Positioning options =

*Top location*
 ControlStage.TOP

*Bottom location*
 ControlStage.BOTTOM

*Left location*
 ControlStage.LEFT

*Right location*
 ControlStage.RIGHT

*Centered location*
 ControlStage.CENTER

== Combinations ==

You can combine options, for example:

 ControlStage.TOP + ControlStage.RIGHT
